desc: Our brand was created with the intention of providing you with a convenient and inspiring coffee shop experience at home. B Coffee Co. aims to give you the liberty to conceive your own coffee shop creations in the comfort of your living room and B your own barista today.

layout.text: Unmissable to get going as your own barista. The Freshman is our compact and user friendly coffee capsule machine that will allow you to experiment away and come up with the most delightful and creative coffee creations.
